author: Srinath Madhavan
text: To celebrate 30 Seasons of That #UCLFeeling, I just voted for some of my greatest #UCL moments! To be in with a chance to WIN UCL final tickets, enter now! https://t.co/aksCQOmj1v

author: Srinath Madhavan
text: Just imagine, a lifetime achievement of getting so close to Rooneys record. Staying injured most of the season. Not getting picked in starting XI in your last game, the only chance to equal it. Then coming on in the last 30 mins to score 2 peaches and break it. Absolute legend!

author: Srinath Madhavan
text:
Got these two absolute beauties delivered to Muscat by my good friend @JerseyRepublicc from Mumbai.
Do check out if you're interested. They've got scores of great quality affordable merchandise.
The past few weeks have been tough but I know the team will bounce back. YNWA @LFC https://t.co/z4h2g6qMvP
